item.description:
The "Original Sunday Brunch"is held every other month at the great Gaslight au Coin in the fabulous South End!

Once again, choose from the "Prix fix" $9.95 (exclusive of taxes & gratuity) menu of 3 entrees, 2 juices, coffee or tea and a sweet a la Julia Child...or ask for the regular menu and feast on some of the Gaslight's other delicious offerings.

Free parking is adjacent to the restaurant!

Please pay your server. Paypal is NOT accepted at this event.

Plan to visit the SOWA (indoor) Winter markets nearby for fresh veggies, cheeses, preserves, pastries and quality crafts.

Limited to 40. Please RSVP byÂ April 20th. Mark Carrig (978.314.5371)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the happy, chatty group in the back! Just ask the hostess!
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Gaslight!
